DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation endometrial preparation use either hormonal therapy ovarian stimulation prior frozen-thawed embryo transfer ( FET ) patient polycystic ovarian syndrome ( PCOS )
DOC.brief_title: HRT Versus MOS Endometrial Preparation Prior FET PCOS Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Women randomly divide two group ; one subject endometrial preparation hormone replacement therapy ( HRT ) subject minimal ovarian stimulation ( MOS ) . Women HRT group give estradiol valerate 4 mg daily day 2 day 12 cycle endometrial thickness assess day 13 transvaginal sonography ( TVS ) . If endometrium â‰¥ 8 mm moderate echogenicity , luteal phase support ( use progesterone supplement ) start endometrium < 8 mm , estradiol valerate continue reach appropriate endometrial thickness echogenicity luteal phase support start . Women MOS group give clomiphene citrate dose 100-150 mg daily 5 day ( day 2 day 6 cycle ) switch low dose gonadotropin ( 75-150 IU daily ) follow monitor follicular growth ( folliculometry ) ) ; start day 10 stimulation cycle repeat every 2 day . Final oocyte maturation induce administration human chorionic gonadotropin ( HCG ) least one lead follicle > 18 mm diameter follow luteal phase support ( use progesterone supplement ) 48 hour . In group , FET plan appropriate day accord stage embryo cryopreserved .
DOC.criteria: Women PCOS define Rotterdam criterion . Presence least 2 cryopreserved good quality cleavagestage embryo ( good quality cleavagestage embryos display stagespecific cell division , blastomeres fairly equal size cytoplasmic fragment ) . Moderate severe endometriosis . Hydrosalpinx . Uterine abnormalities myoma . Previous uterine surgery .
